name: Balls.io vs Bricks
description:
Supper addictive bricks breaker game! Classic bricks shooting game becomes the modern chain of balls shooting game.

The gameplay is very simple: Press and swipe your finger to aim. Release to shoot the chain of balls like a snake. The number of color brick decreased while the lovely ball hit it, and it crushes when the number reaches to zero. Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom. Smash the ball emitter to increase your balls chain. Collect stars to use bomb power up.

Support iMessage now! DOWNLOAD for FREE and play with your friends through iMessage.

Very easy to play, but hard to reach high scores. Can you get 100 balls in one game?
Hint: try to hit into the hole, and smash down the bricks from up side.

Features:
• Relaxed gameplay, perfect time killer
• Easy aiming: Press and swipe finger to aim. Release to shoot chain of balls like a snake
• Modes:
- Classic: rectangle blocks
- Triangle: triangle bricks
- Pentagon: pentagon bricks
- Hexagon: hexa bricks
- Circle: circle bricks
- Shapes: all shapes mixed rectangle, triangle, pentagon, hexagon and circle
- Zero: number 0 bricks that could not be broken
- Rotate: All shapes with rotating pentagon and hexagon bricks
• Speed up when the balls fly long time in the sky
• Use Bomb power up to pop lowest 1 lines of bricks
• Game center leaderboards
• Play with your friends through iMessage
